title: Citi Guatemala Launches New Citi Visa Signature Credit Card: A World of Benefits in a Single Card
summary: Guatemala City, Guatemala - Today Citi Guatemala introduced Citi Visa Signature, an exclusive credit card designed for the preferential segment that offers the most Multi-Award Miles and exclusive client benefits.
tag-1: Citi Guatemala Launches New Citi Visa Signature Credit Card: A World of Benefits in a Single Card
tag-2: Guatemala City, Guatemala – Today Citi Guatemala introduced Citi Visa Signature, an exclusive credit card designed for the preferential segment that offers the most Multi-Award Miles and exclusive client benefits.
tag-3: The main benefits of the Signature cards are:
tag-4: Multi-Award Miles is the Loyalty Program of Citi Multi-Award Credit Cards and offers the most miles when combined with the Citi Visa Signature Card.
tag-5: "This year we mark 200 years of operations around the world, two centuries characterized by progress and innovation," said Bernardo Chacin, Director of Citi Guatemala. "Our mission is to offer our clients simple, straightforward and innovative solutions. And so today we are offering Guatemalans the Citi Visa Signature Card. Guatemala is a market where we want to keep growing."
tag-6: The card also includes Priority Pass benefits, which give access to more than 600 VIP lounges at airports in more than 100 countries and 300 cities around the world. There is no membership fee, and new cardholders receive 25,000 welcome miles.
tag-7: "At Citi we are constantly seeking ways to bring our clients greater value-added products and services," said Rubén Gross, Director of Consumer Banking at Citi Guatemala. "Signature is a lifestyle that brings exclusive status for cardholders."
tag-10: For more information please visit www.visa.com.
tag-12: Citi works tirelessly to serve individuals, communities, institutions and nations. With 200 years of experience facing the most difficult challenges the world has to offer and taking advantage of its greatest opportunities, Citi strives to achieve the best results for its clients, offering simple, creative and responsible financial solutions. Citi connects more than 1,000 cities, 160 countries and millions of people around the world.
tag-13: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
